DOC.brief_summary: Diacutaneous Fibrolysis ( DF ) manual method treatment , usually adjuvant , addressed mechanical pain locomotor system . In clinical practice favorable effect observe patient chronic lateral epicondylitis , publish study evaluate result technique . The objective trial evaluate DF provide improvement pain intensity , pain-pressure threshold , function pain-free grip strength , patient chronic lateral epicondylitis treat physiotherapy . For purpose , conduct randomize controlled trial , double-blind ( patient evaluator ) Public Primary Care Center . Sixty subject randomize ( computer application ) three group : Intervention Group , Placebo Group Control Group . All three group receive protocolized treatment physiotherapy additionally . Additionally , Intervention Group receive six session ( two session week three week ) real DF Placebo Group receive six session ( two session week three week ) sham DF . The Control Group receive protocolized treatment physiotherapy . Pain intensity ( VAS ) , pain-pressure threshold ( pressure algometry ) , function ( DASH questionnaire ) pain-free grip strength ( digital dynamometer ) measure baseline , treatment period , three month discharge treatment . After discharge treatment patient subjective opinion evolution collect Global Rating Change ( GROC ) scale .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Diagnosis chronic lateral epicondylalgia Sign inform consent form Concomitant condition affect upper extremity Contraindications Diacutaneous Fibrolysis Corticosteroid injection similar agent three month prior study inclusion Pending litigation legal claim Poor language communication skill make difficult understand inform consent
